mymou.preferences.SeekBarPreferenceCusto.app:title: Time between each individual sound and its partner (ms)
mymou.preferences.SeekBarPreferenceCusto.app:summary: e.g. when playing A-B what is the length of time after A starts that B plays. Tap to input number

mymou.preferences.SeekBarPreferenceCusto.app:title: Time between each pair of sounds (ms)
mymou.preferences.SeekBarPreferenceCusto.app:summary: e.g. when playing A-B-response-reward-C-D, what is the length of time reward that C starts playing. Tap to input number

mymou.preferences.SeekBarPreferenceCusto.app:title: Maximum reaction time allowed (ms)
mymou.preferences.SeekBarPreferenceCusto.app:summary: Reward amount is scaled by this amount. (e.g. if set to 1500ms and they react in 750ms, they will receive 750ms of reward). Tap to input number
